text: apane rab kee kshama aur us jannat kee or agrasar hone mein ek-doosare se baazee le jao, jisaka vistaar aakaash aur dharatee ke vistaar jaisa hai, jo un logon ke lie taiyaar kee gaee hai jo allaah aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lae hon. yah allaah ka udaar anugrah hai, jise chaahata hai pradaan karata hai. allaah bade udaar anugrah ka maalik hai
